name: Net Gain
description:
Hello! This game was made by me (Plekto) and my friend Tyler for the #SeaJam by PolyMars! It's the first game either of us has published so we hope you enjoy it! Play in full screen for the best experience, and press the info button to play through the tutorial. In this game, you play as a boat that must collect the trash that is coming at it with a net, and then empty that net by switching to the Trash Launcher^(TM) to score! All of the Audio was made by me (Plekto), and if you want to hear more I would greatly appreciate it if you could check out my:

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/0O8jddlmdLudcm3lWtpv8o?si=l60CtHE_RNuWFiQeHR5maQ

SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/plekto (The Net Gain soundtrack (Waves) will be available for listening on my SoundCloud shortly!)

We would like to give a big thank you to PolyMars for hosting the Game Jam, MrBeast for creating #TeamSeas, and I want to give a big shoutout to Tyler for working on this project with me!

Also, feel free to comment your high score! (Mine is 219 :))
